title: Taash and the Jesters
description: The Orphan Taash couldn't have imagined the perilous adventures awaiting him. At the end of the forbidden path, he finds himself on a desolate moor and sees witches casting a spell on an infant boy. Taash impulsively snatches the child away from these chanting demonsâ€”and is thrown into a terrifying stuggle against evil forces plotting to overthrow the king.
author: Ellen Kindt McKenzie
